QuestData.Title: Keeping it Together
QuestData.Description: So much work to do... I don't even know where to start.$b$bMaking sure this garrison is operational is not an easy task.$b$bShelly still hasn't reported back to me, my assistant Brightstone and her crew are who knows where, ugh... I'm so caught up I haven't even had time to check our cache for resources.$b$bIf I were a mage, do you think I could use mirror images to do all of this at once?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shelly, find Assistant Brightstone, and check the Garrison Cache.
QuestData.CompletionText: Can we speak a little later, $GSir:Madam;? I don't really have time to talk at the moment.
QuestData.RewardText: You did what? You are a life saver, commander.$b$bWith those tasks out of the way my job will be much easier.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Assistant Brightstone about her work ethic
